actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to provide operating assistance for projects located in areas other than urbanized areas.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to authorize the use of funds made available under such Act for projects in area other than urbanized areas, for the payment of subsidies for the payment of subsidies for operating expenses in such areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to provide operating assistance for projects located in areas other than urbanized areas.
